name: The Outback Hunt
description:
This is a digital board game made for the One Script Jam 2021 - the theme of which was 'the hunt'. The aim of the game is to be the first hunter to hunt enough animals to reach the target score. There are 4 different types of cells on the board, each of which having different chances for finding prey to hunt. You play the game as follows.

1. On your turn, click the roll button to determine how many cells you move.

2. If an animal appears, click on it to aim your gun.

3. Once you are aiming at an animal you will need to quickly press the keys that appear on the screen to successfully bag the animal.

The following assets were used in this game. The 3D model of the table and its textures were done by @TheOriginal (cheers Mitch!).

Action Jackson Font
High Summit Font
Fine Wood Texture
Clean Wood Planks Texture

There are a couple of things I didn't manage to do in time - the possum has a placeholder sprite still; players 3 & 4 re-use the same voice lines as players 1 & 2; I re-use a lot of SFX for multiple sounds, and I would have liked to have also added some music.

The audio does not work in the browser build.
